title: Petition to keep borders earned from last season. ~*~*~
body:
I don't think I am the only one sad about grinding for a ranked border only to find out we don't get the permanent one we all know and love. I know I'm only silver but still felt good to get put of bronze for the first time as a sup main. Sadder than i should be about this haha.

Maybe they will keep if if there is enough support for it :)

replies.body:
So your previous season rank will still show in quite a few places. On the banner in your profile, ranked dashboard, maybe loading screen (that was kind of unclear) and lobby. There's more details about the other changes in the video, but we likely don't know everything just yet.

https://youtu.be/UDvRhUyHsKA?t=121
Not sure about the border as it will be updating every split but pretty sure loading screen will show your last season rank
